name: Tiny Cafe
description:
Controls (Keyboard)

Up, Down, Left and right or WASD - navigate menus

Enter - click button

Controls (Xbox 360 / One controller)

D-Pad - navigate menus

A - click button

Description

Tiny Cafe is a small Tycoon game styled for the GameBoy (But built in Godot). 

You play the role of a Cafe Owner selecting Products on a week by week basis.

Every 4 weeks you will have bills to pay, watch out these rise very quickly.

Different Products sell better during different weather so to better optimise your product selection look at the weather forecast at the top of the screen.

To Start, I would recommend buying the coffee.
